restrictionInstructions.dataDistribution: To be made available to all S1000D users.

exportControl.exportRegistrationStmt: Export of this data module to all countries that are the residence of organizations that are users of S1000D is permitted. Storage of this data module is at the discretion of the organization.

restrictionInstructions.dataHandling: There are no specific handling instructions for this data module.
restrictionInstructions.dataDestruction: Users may destroy this data module in accordance with their own local procedures.
restrictionInstructions.dataDisclosure: There are no dissemination limitations that apply to this data module.

Neither ASD nor any person who has contributed to the creation, revision or maintenance of this material shall be liable for any direct, indirect, special or consequential damages or any other liability.

step.proceduralStep: Do a visual inspection of the brakes as given in the pre-ride checks (refer to dmRef).
Find each of the brake pads.

step.para: Apply a thin layer of the rubbing alcohol (sup-0001) on each of the brake pads using a lint-free cloth (sup-0002).

step.proceduralStep: Rub the surface until you have applied the alcohol to the complete surface of the pad.
